aida.name: AIDA
aida.components: Attention: Grab focus, Interest: Provide info, Desire: Build emotion, Action: CTA
aida.example: Headline grabs attention, subheadline provides info, benefits build desire, CTA prompts action

pas.name: PAS
pas.components: Problem: Identify pain, Agitate: Amplify urgency, Solve: Present solution
pas.example: Problem: Can't increase CLV. Agitate: Loses revenue yearly. Solve: Implement this automation.

fab.name: FAB
fab.components: Feature: What it is, Advantage: What it does, Benefit: How customer feels
fab.example: Feature: Automated workflows. Advantage: Saves 8 hours/week. Benefit: More time for strategy.

bab.name: BAB
bab.components: Before: Current frustration, After: Desired outcome, Bridge: The product
bab.example: Before: Overwhelmed with manual tasks. After: Calm, organized, strategic. Bridge: Use Da Vinci.

4ps.name: 4Ps
4ps.components: Promise: The hook, Picture: Visualize, Proof: Credibility, Push: CTA
4ps.example: Promise: 3x conversions. Picture: Envision revenue growth. Proof: 100+ case studies. Push: Start free trial.

hero.name: Hero Section
hero.components: Headline: UVP, Subheadline: Context, Visuals: Connection, CTA: Action
hero.example: Headline: Generate 10x Email Sequences in Hours. Subheadline: AI-powered copywriting for DTC. CTA: Start free.
